isis.stitle: ELECTRICAL SYSTEM TROUBLESHOOTING GUIDE - 9800 - HUBS, BEARINGS, AND SEALS - WHEEL SEALS

svcsubsecinfo.para: To insure satisfactory performance of wheel seals, various precautions are necessary whether the vehicle is equipped with grease or oil lubricated wheel bearings.
Always replace wheel seals whenever the wheel and hub assembly is removed.
Due to various types of wheel seals, it is important that the seal installation and position be checked at the time of disassembly to be assured that the new seals are properly installed.
The types of wheel seals used are designed to be used with oil lubricated wheel bearings.

note.para:
When installing seals, use the proper installation tool. These tools are supplied by the seal manufacturer. Also, refer to SPECIAL TOOLS
.
Before installing a new seal, check seal for damage that may have been caused during shipping and handling.
